photoAlt: A white background with three sections in a column. The first section is a 5 by 6 grid of squares; the first row is filled with the letters pearl, the others are blank. Below the grid is an input with the word CHART inside it, followed by a qwerty keyboard display, with a mix of green, dark gray, and light gray backgrounds.
tagline: Guess the word in 6 guesses or less!
title: Wordle
